body.description: Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion from Nubian Heritage takes dull, dry skin seriously; it's a body butter and body cream for aging, sensitive skin. This silky Nubian Heritage body lotion and dry skin treatment soothes and nourishes your dry skin with coconut oil, cocoa butter and mango seed oil. Based in the ancient wisdom of certified organic and fair trade raw shea butter, our body moisturizer leaves behind glowing skin and radiant skin. Give yourself the ultimate royal treatment with Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion for women or men's skin care; it's also the perfect hand lotion for dry hands and treats your skin like royalty. Massage body butter, body lotion and moisturizer into dry skin or combination skin. Daily use will result in healthier-looking clear skin. Nubian Heritage skin care lotion is never tested on animals but always free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, gluten, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances and artificial colors. Our heritage: Historical references to Shea Butter, a staple of African pharmacology, date back to the reported Shea Butter caravans of Cleopatra's Egypt. Shea butter is rich in essential fatty acids, which moisturize and soften skin. Frankincense has aromatherapy benefits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Envelop your skin with a clean, subtly sweet, and herbal aroma. Nubian Heritage Raw Shea Butter Body Lotion nourishes dry skin, leaving it softer and rejuvenated.

Moisturizing Skin Care This silky Nubian Heritage body lotion, infused with Raw Shea Butter, Soy Milk, Frankincense and Myrrh, nourishes dry skin. Ancient Solutions for Modern Wellness Nubian Heritage offers culturally authentic products infused with naturally-derived ingredients inspired by global ancient philosophies. Cruelty-Free, Heritage Ingredients We make our products using globally sourced ingredients and never test on animals. Humble Beginnings Born on the streets of Harlem in 1992 but based on centunes-old traditions Nubian Heritage has been guided by the legacy of ancient Nubia, the world's first melting pot.

Nubian Heritage Patchouli & Buriti Body Lotion, 13 oz Nubian Heritage Coconut & Papaya Body Wash, 13 oz Nubian Heritage Raw Shea Butter Body Wash, 13 oz Main Benefit Envelop your skin with an uplifting and exotic fragrance. This aromatic body lotion helps smooth and moisturize skin, leaving it with a beautiful glow. This gentle, creamy body wash lathers and diffuses lush and tropical notes for a refreshing experience, leaving skin feeling revitalized and renewed. This gentle, silky body wash lathers and diffuses a clean, subtly sweet and herbal fragrance for a spa-like experience, leaving skin feeling rejuvenated and restored.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for years and it's the only moisturizer that prevents my fingers from cracking in the cold. I HIGHLY recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like it!
reviews.reviewText: I have really dry skin. This product is thick enough to moisturize and doesn't leave an oily residue. I don't know what the old formulation that people are reviewing was like but this product is pretty thick, but not so thick that you can't get it out of the bottle. I store my bottle upside down so that I don't have to squeeze it and that helps. When I get to towards the end of the bottle, I supposed I can let the bottle sit upside down in a warm water bath and I think that should do the trick. As far as the scent, it is really, really nice. I wear scented oils and I feel like this product's scent is strong enough that I don't need any additional scented oils; at least for a few hours. The lotion is fragrant but doesn't last as long as an oil would though. I would definitely order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is amazing. The smell is subtle but still great & I like that the texture is not too runny. It’s very moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I squeezed the contents into another container and that works for me. Plus other ppl can smell the scented lotion. But unfortunately I cannot after application adding essential oils helps with moisture —————————-This squeeze bottle is too difficult to get the product extracted. It takes me two hands to squeeze the lotion out. And sometimes it clogs. Have to remove cap.Moisture? Maybe adding my own coconut essential oil gives my skin moisture but this shea butter lotion ain’t it!The scent on the soap is why I purchased the lotion. Nope! Not the same strength in scent. Very mild. Therefore money paid wasn’t worth the value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have to add massage oil because this lotion is so thick. But well worth it. I have very dry skin. This works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very moisturizing, lasts all day long!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is so moiturizing! It does have a strong Shea butter scent to it which I don’t mind as it smells lovely. However if you’re going for unscented, this is not it. I have to keep the bottle on it’s side in order to quickly get product out when I squeeze because it’s more creamy than lotiony. I wish the bottle was designed with the lid as the base to ease product let down. Everything else though I love! It keeps my skin moisturized alll day long! Love it! I will be using this especially in the winter months. With the weather getting so hot now though I’m going to look for a lighter lotion hopefully as moisturizing as this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this shea based scented lotion. I've bought multiple bottles of this and just love it! I do wish the company would use a thinner plastic to disperse the product. That's my only complaint. I've noticed on reviews, people are seeing some weird color on the top of the bottle and the product is perfectly fine! I put mine in a glass jar and have noticed the oxidization of the shea. Do not fret! This is normal for a CLEAN product to turn a little. There's nothing wrong with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Love the product. Recieved bad batch!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this lotion for years and have never had an issue. Until this most recent purchase. Within theb2 pack of lotion one of the bottles had MOLD inside of the bottle. It was visible through the bottle and then was all throughout the bottle. Very disappointed that this was sent out and sold.Normally this lotion is and has been great for my skin. Smells great and has helped to relief redness while keeping me moisturized.Would like a replacement sent!
